newsitem.title: USA: Resource stake lifted by Kramer Spellman.
newsitem.headline: Resource stake lifted by Kramer Spellman.

text.p: A group led by Kramer Spellman L.P. said Thursday it raised its stake in Resource America Inc 401,500 common shares or 11.31 pecent from 7.98 percent held previously.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net 118,000 common bought between January 3 and January 15 at prices ranging from $18 to $20.181 per share.
The group said it holds the stake in the Philadelphia, Pa.,-based company for investment purposes.
Resource America Inc is engaged in the acquisition and resolution of commercial real estate loans, commercial equipment leasing and energy operations including gas and oil production.
